document_data.name: Ko Mei Kho
document_data.mainbody: '''Ko Mei Kho''' was a [[Shou]] merchant in [[Kozakura]] in the 1350s [[DR]].
document_data.History: Ko Mei Kho was a merchant and representative of the mercantile [[Ko clan]] in a town in Kozakura. In [[1357 DR]], on the request of his cousin the colonial governor at [[Akari]], [[Ko Lei Kho]], he hired an adventuring party to investigate an [[ochimo]] in Akari.
document_data.Personality: Mei Kho was honest to the point of tactlessness, as was traditional in the Ko clan, and honored any agreement struck.
